statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE origin_city = 'New York';
SELECT route_id, origin_city, destination_city FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance > 500;
SELECT destination_city, cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs WHERE origin_city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY cost_per_km DESC;
SELECT origin_city, destination_city, distance, cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost_per_km < 20.00 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost_per_km BETWEEN 15.00 AND 25.00 ORDER BY route_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE origin_city = 'New York' AND destination_city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT route_id, origin_city, destination_city, distance, cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY cost_per_km DESC;
SELECT AVG(cost_per_km) AS average_cost_per_km FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance > 1000;
SELECT destination_city, SUM(cost_per_km * distance) AS total_cost FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY destination_city;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE origin_city LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT route_id, total_cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE total_cost > 500;
SELECT route_id, travel_time, vehicle_type FROM routes WHERE travel_time < 4;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT route_id, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY cost_per_mile DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE travel_time < 5 ORDER BY start_location ASC;
SELECT route_id, distance, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_costs WHERE total_cost < 500 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, travel_time FROM routes WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' ORDER BY start_location DESC;
SELECT route_id, end_location, vehicle_type FROM routes WHERE travel_time > 10 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT route_id, distance, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost_per_mile > 0;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, mode_of_transport FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT expense_id, route_id, total_cost FROM expenses WHERE total_cost < 500;
SELECT route_id, distance, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance >= 100 AND cost_per_mile < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance > 100
SELECT origin, destination, mode_of_transport FROM routes WHERE mode_of_transport = 'train' ORDER BY origin
SELECT route_id, SUM(total_cost) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY route_id HAVING total_expenses > 500
SELECT DISTINCT destination FROM routes WHERE origin IN ('New York', 'Chicago') ORDER BY destination DESC
SELECT route_id, distance, cost_per_mile, total_cost FROM transportation_costs JOIN expenses ON transportation_costs.route_id = expenses.route_id
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_id, origin_city, destination_city FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT route_id, distance, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE capacity >= 50 ORDER BY fuel_efficiency DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_cost FROM transportation_orders WHERE total_cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT origin_city, destination_city, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_routes WHERE cost_per_mile < 2 ORDER BY cost_per_mile ASC;
SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.capacity, v.fuel_efficiency, f.price_per_gallon FROM vehicles v JOIN fuel_prices f ON v.vehicle_type = f.fuel_type WHERE v.capacity > 5 ORDER BY v.capacity DESC;

SELECT tr.route_id, tr.origin_city, tr.destination_city, tr.distance, tr.cost_per_mile, t.order_date, t.total_cost FROM transportation_routes tr JOIN transportation_orders t ON tr.route_id = t.route_id ORDER BY t.total_cost DESC;

SELECT tr.route_id, tr.origin_city, tr.destination_city, tr.distance, tr.cost_per_mile, v.vehicle_type, v.capacity, v.fuel_efficiency, f.price_per_gallon FROM transportation_routes tr JOIN transportation_orders t ON tr.route_id = t.route_id JOIN vehicles v ON t.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN fuel_prices f ON v.vehicle_type = f.fuel_type WHERE tr.distance < 200 AND t.total_cost < 1000 ORDER BY tr.distance ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT origin_location, destination_location, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_efficiency >= 30 ORDER BY max_capacity DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT e.name, v.vehicle_type, r.origin_location, r.destination_location FROM employees e JOIN vehicles v ON e.employee_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN transportation_routes r ON v.vehicle_id = r.route_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE cost_per_mile < 0.1 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT origin_location, destination_location, cost_per_mile * distance AS total_cost FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY total_cost ASC;

SELECT e.name, v.vehicle_type, t.origin_location, t.destination_location FROM employees e JOIN assignments a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id JOIN vehicles v ON a.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN transportation_routes t ON a.route_id = t.route_id WHERE e.position = 'Driver';

SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_id, o.order_date, SUM(t.distance) AS total_distance FROM orders o JOIN assignments a ON o.order_id = a.assignment_id JOIN transportation_routes t ON a.route_id = t.route_id GROUP BY o.order_id HAVING total_distance > 500;

SELECT e.name, e.position, SUM(t.cost_per_mile * t.distance) AS total_cost FROM employees e JOIN assignments a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id JOIN transportation_routes t ON a.route_id = t.route_id GROUP BY e.name, e.position ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
